summary: The env_escape plugin implements a remote execution framework for Metaflow, providing utilities to generate trampoline scripts, manage paths, serialize and deserialize data and exceptions, proxy objects via a clientâ€‘server channel, dynamically import modules, and stub remote objects so that code can run in a separate interpreter or isolated environment while preserving normal object semantics.
business_intent: Allow Metaflow workflows to escape the local Python environment and execute steps on remote or isolated runtimes, ensuring seamless object interaction and robust exception handling across environment boundaries.
